message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $14,000 is really my bottom line. This product is in high demand and I'm confident in its value.

I understand that the product is in high demand, but I'm still not convinced that it's worth $14,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
